entry.def: If you say that someone has a bolt-hole to go to, you mean that there is somewhere that they can go when they want to get away from people that they know.

example.ex: The hotel is an ideal bolt-hole for Londoners.
example.tran: 这家旅馆是伦敦人理想的避风港。

means.word_mean: 1. a hole through which an animal may bolt when pursued into its burrow or den
